entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:18 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 10:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
